title: Pires
body: In 1566, a certain Gonçalo Pires lived in Funchal, who held the position of clerk of the accounts, and in 1471, Diogo Pires and Francisco Pires had residence here. It is possible that these three individuals brought the family name Pires to Madeira.

Funchal: Location where Gonçalo Pires, Diogo Pires, and Francisco Pires lived

Gonçalo Pires: Lived in Funchal in 1566 and held the position of clerk of the accounts

1566: Residence of Gonçalo Pires in Funchal
1471: Residence of Diogo Pires and Francisco Pires in Funchal
